util

Class TableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.TableBuilder

  • public class TableBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    TableBuilder allows for the creation of tables through the use of formatted print statement.
    Author:
    jdowd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableBuilder()
      this is a no arg constructor, it should be used when adding columns to a table.
      TableBuilder(java.lang.String simpleMessage)
      this constructor allows for the creation of a one by one table for the display of simple strings.
      TableBuilder(java.lang.String[] pColHeaders)
      this constructor allows for the insertion of the column headers.
      TableBuilder(java.lang.String[] pColHeaders, int[] pColWidths) 
      TableBuilder(java.lang.String[] pColHeaders, java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> pColContents) 
      TableBuilder(java.lang.String[] pColHeaders, java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> pColContents, int[] pColWidths)
